author: depasse
body:
#### PR description:

ECAL : for appending EcalTimeCalibConstants tags with new payloads : tool to create sqlite files from raw xxx.dat or xxx.xml files.

#### PR validation:

Tested (cmsRun updateTimeCalib.py) in CMSSW_13 and this 14_1 IB with xxx.dat and xxx.xml source files  : same payloads generated (hashes)
title: ECAL : Tool to create sqlite files for DB
